name: SmartMath
0:
”Alexa, open Smart Math.”
”Alexa, open Smart Math and start addition.”
”Alexa, open Smart Math and start division.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart math
des:
When you choose your subject, addition, subtraction, multiplication or division, you'll be given 40 seconds to solve as many problems as you can. 

If you can solve 6 questions correctly, you can move on to the next level with more difficult problems.

On the menu mode, you can ask 'What's my score?' to track your score. Problems at the higher level will give you more points.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
